transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Hello?

Executive: Haan boliye mam.

Customer: Didi, mam ek kaam kariye usme agar aapko kuch clear nahi ho raha hai, toh aap ek alternate mail id usme update kar dijiye.

Customer: Toh dusri mail id is par aap, ek se kam nahi hota?
Executive: Kya keh rahe hai? Ek se kam nahi hota kya? Ek se kam nahi hota kya aapka mail hota hai?
Customer: Haan toh dusra hai na already.

Executive: Toh yaha pe jaise aapka harsh product wala @gmail.com jo chal rahi hai mail id is par.
Customer: Haan, hai.
Executive: Ji.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Alternate, haan ji haan ji koi alternate ho toh aap update kar dijiye uske baad jab aapka ye clear ho jayega messages wala tab aap ye cheez update kar lijiyega but koi alternative ho kyuki yaha se jo bhi team hamari hai usko.
Customer: Abhi toh nahi hai mam.
Executive: Ji?

Customer: Abhi toh nahi hai dusra.

Executive: Accha accha, toh aap mail inbox toh clear kar rahi hai mam kyuki yaha pe dekh rahe hai toh din full aa raha hai account clear.
Customer: Pura pura clear kiya hai mam. Pura pura clear kiya hai maine pura empty kiya hai dekhna chahoge toh team viewer mein dungi main aapko.

Executive: Ba, accha accha bilkul aap mujhe ek screen share dijiyega toh main bhi yaha se dekh lungi. Dusri cheez aap apna seller panel open kar rahe hai toh waha verified mail mang raha hai verification mail ke liye.

Customer: Kya kya?

Executive: Jab aap apna IndiaMART ke application open kar rahe ho ya seller panel login kar rahe ho toh waha pe verification mail mang rahi hai na?

Customer: Hmm, mang rahi hai na.
Executive: Verified your mail, haan. Toh wohi par verify kariye. Dekhiye koi aa raha hai? Main line pe hu aap usko verify kariye.

Executive: Mail aapke desktop pe login hai mam ya phone mein?

Customer: Nahi aa raha hai abhi bhi.

Executive: Ah, aapko main, hmm.

Executive: Ek minute ek minute main wohi aapko bata rahi hu ki main aapko ek kaam karti hu, ah, Google meet ka link bhej rahi hu aap mujhe screen present karke dikha dijiye ki kaha issue aa raha hai fir main aapko guide kar deti hu, thik hai?

Customer: Oh, okay okay.

Executive: Maine aapko Google meet ka link bhej diya aapke register mail id pe but us pe mail nahi ja raha hai toh main aapko isi number same number pe whatsapp kar rahi hu. Dekhiye koi aaya mail aaya mere side se aapko?

Customer: Mere side se mail aaya aapko?

Customer: Hmm.

Customer: Mail bhi nahi aur whatsapp bhi nahi.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai, line pe rahiye main whatsapp pe aapko bhej rahi hu ek second bas.


Executive: Ye secondary number aap sahi hai na? Main aapko bhejti hu.

Customer: Jo aapne abhi lagaya hai usi pe bhejiye.

Executive: Thik hai. Mera message aapko mila mam?

Customer: Haan mila mila.
Executive: Haan hello ka message hai na aur main meeting link ka bhi message aapko iske bhej dijiye, thik hai? Aap phone se join karengi ya desktop se join karengi?

Customer: Phone se hi, desktop pe ye nahi hoga.

Executive: Phone se hi join kar rahi ho mam?

Executive: Okay okay aap phone se join kar rahe ho.

Executive: Toh lekin fir phone mein aapka application nahi hai na? Aapke desktop pe application hai toh aapko screen desktop pe dikhani padegi. Aap desktop dikha dijiyega mujhe thik hai? Join kariye mam meeting.


Executive: Ye harsh product ke naam se aap koi dusri mail bhi use kar rahe ho kya?

Customer: Kya?

Executive: Harsh product ke naam se aap koi dusri mail bhi use kar rahi hai kya?

Customer: Dusri mail?

Executive: Ji. Ji nahi mam wohi hai yaha pe. Harsh products.

Executive: Ek second main aap apna bluetooth connect kar rahi hu aap thoda line pe rahiye.


Executive: Okay, ah, dekhiye mam meri aawaz aa rahi hai aapko desktop se?

Executive: Hello? Meri aawaz aa rahi hai na mam aapko desktop se?

Customer: Aa rahi hai.

Executive: Hello? Kya keh rahi hai? Haan ji haan ji meri desktop se aawaz aa rahi hai aapko?

Customer: Haan ji aa rahi hai.

Executive: Thik hai toh main call mam rakh rahe hai thik hai kyuki main meet pe hi aapko bata deti hu call pe.
summary:
Concerns:

- Facing issues with receiving verification emails.

- Unable to log in to the seller panel.

- Mailbox showing as full despite clearing it.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested updating an alternate email ID.

- Executive offered to guide via Google Meet.

- Executive sent a Google Meet link via WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to join Google Meet to resolve issue.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- verification, email, login, google meet
